branchCategory.name: CP96S(D), ISO 15552 Cylinder, Double Acting, Single/Double Rod w/Air Cushion and Bumper Cushion
branchCategory.description: CP96, profile tube design ISO cylinder with enclosed tie rods, is available in 6 bore sizes from ø32 to ø125mm.  The series is available with a single or double rod in 6 bore sizes from ø32 to ø125mm. The air cushion and bumper cushion combination greatly reduces noise at the end of stroke. High accuracy covers and tie rod nuts improve mounting accuracy and extend the cylinder life. Increasing the precision of the bushing and piston rod, as well as reducing tolerances, has decreased the deflection of the piston rod. Standard strokes range from 25 to 800mm.
